member.name: T:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO
member.summary: This class enables the user to make operations on the "Person" table. With this DAO, you can create, update, delete and search for persons.

member.name: M:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO.CreatePerson(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new person with the given values
member.returns: the id of the inserted person

member.name: M:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO.SavePerson(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Save the given person. Make a single UPDATE on the database with the id.
member.param: The id of the person to save

member.name: M:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO.ArchivePerson(System.Int32)
member.summary: Archive the person with the given id
member.param: The id of the person to save

member.name: M:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO.SearchPersons(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Search for persons in the database using the given arguments as criteria
member.param: The name to search persons for
The first name to search persons for
Indicate if we must search for the archived persons to
member.returns: all the persons matching the criterias

member.name: M:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO.GetPersonByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the person with the given id
member.param: The id of the person to search
member.returns: the person with the given ID or null if there is no person with this person

member.name: M:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO.GetAllPersons
member.summary: Returns all the persons of the database.
member.returns: a List containing all the persons

member.name: M:ICM.Dao.PersonsDAO.BindPerson(ICM.Utils.SqlResult)
member.summary: Bind the SQL Result to a Person object
member.param: The result of a SQL query
member.returns: a new instance of Person with the values of the SQL Result
